text: Hardly likely, my sweet. Luke's surgery goes on for hours. If they get in before eight-thirty, even though they're standing on one another's toes, I've got to see 'em. If I am free, though, I'll give you a ring, O.K.?
handwritten_text: Hardly likely, my sweet. Luke's surgery goes on for hours. If they get in before eight-thirty, even though they're standing on one another's toes, I've got to see 'em. If I am free, though, I'll give you a ring, O.K.?
